an4.22:1.1: “Ekamidaham, bhikkhave, samayam uruvelayam viharami najja neranjaraya tire ajapalanigrodhe pathamabhisambuddho.
an4.22:1.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sambahula brahmana jinna vuddha mahallaka addhagata vayoanuppatta yenaham tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva maya saddhim sammodimsu.
an4.22:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho, bhikkhave, te brahmana mam etadavocum:
an4.22:1.5: “na samano gotamo brahmane jinne vuddhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivadeti va paccuttheti va asanena va nimanteti”ti.
an4.22:1.7: Na hi bhavam gotamo brahmane jinne vuddhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivadeti va paccuttheti va asanena va nimanteti.
an4.22:2.2: ‘nayime ayasmanto jananti theram va therakarane va dhamme’ti.
an4.22:2.3: Vuddho cepi, bhikkhave, hoti asitiko va navutiko va vassasatiko va jatiya.
an4.22:2.4: So ca hoti akalavadi abhutavadi anatthavadi adhammavadi avinayavadi, anidhanavatim vacam bhasita akalena anapadesam apariyantavatim anatthasamhitam.
an4.22:2.5: Atha kho so ‘balo thero’tveva sankham gacchati.
an4.22:3.1: Daharo cepi, bhikkhave, hoti yuva susukalakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannagato pathamena vayasa.
an4.22:3.2: So ca hoti kalavadi bhutavadi atthavadi dhammavadi vinayavadi nidhanavatim vacam bhasita kalena sapadesam pariyantavatim atthasamhitam.
an4.22:3.3: Atha kho so ‘pandito thero’tveva sankham gacchati.
an4.22:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu
an4.22:4.4: Bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita, ditthiya suppatividdha.
an4.22:4.5: Catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an4.22:4.6: Asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an4.22:4.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro therakarana dhammati.
